DataElement.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module Version 1.0 Complete Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module (questionnaire) that was completed for a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pediatric Quality of Life Brain Tumor Module Version 1.0 Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A quality of life questionnaire designed to measure health-related quality of life in a pediatric brain tumor patient. It is derived from the Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory Generic Core Scales._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.
